Could you give me an icon export string of this? I think I know what the problem is here (text operations being performed on the input with no regard for UTF8 multibyte characters.), but having an export string of it would help to confirm my suspicions.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

@Cybeloras: Go I think i can't give you some strings, beacuse that problem is so magic, every time it appear when you pressed the key for typing some chinese words to edit box (and it's Event Tab Only, Main tab and Coniditon tab / etc don't have this problem).

I try to use four Chinese IME (input method editor) to test, Microsoft Pinyin IME (Simplified Chinese) / Microsoft Changjie IME (Traditional Chinese) / Microsoft Phonetic IME (Traditional Chinese) and Sogou Pinyin IME (Simplified Chinese & Traditional Chinese). Such as the words "i love tellmewhen" in chinese are "我愛tellmewhen", 我-> need press HQI (Changjie) / WO (Pinyin) / JI3 (Phonetic) , 愛-> need press BBPE (Changjie) / AI(Pinyin) / 94 (Phonetic) .
